short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Base64Coder is a Chrome extension that allows you to encode and decode data in Base64 format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension that allows:

- copy text to base64
- copy base64 to text
- copy image to base64
- encode JWT

Encode/decode:
text, audio, video, image to base64

Supports the use of search panel. Enter "64" and press "Tab" to activate the extension.

Supports light/dark themes.
